website_summaries.verdict: With a sublime, but familiar design inside and out, a speedy new processor, fast LTE, and the best apps in the business, the new iPhone is like the old iPhone, just much better.
cons: No simultaneous talk and data connection
New Maps app needs a lot of work
Many third-party apps  are not designed for the new screen yet

customer_reviews.title: All functions work like it was brand new out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The phone I received was exactly what was stated in the description. No defects, scratches or other. The items was quickly paired with the carrier (verizon) and activated. We were able to port the phone number from a different carrier onto the phone without issue. All functions work like it was brand new out of the box. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John and Judy

customer_reviews.title: Glass on screen is loose from body of phone.
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived in good shape and has been working fairly well with the screen glitching out sometimes. I found out that the actual screen is coming loose from the body of the phone and that's why it's been acting like this. I keep it in a case, so I'm not really worried about stuff getting under the screen, but the shop I had look at it said it was likely that way for a long time and I haven't had it all that long. I guess I'll just chalk this up to learning my lesson at buying a refurbished phone from somewhere other than Apple directly. Wish there was better product support for refurbished stuff from companies like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Benson

customer_reviews.title: Trust me its good
customer_reviews.text: Want to say thank you for allowing me to upgrade from my iphone finally. Great low price. I got my phone a day earlier from the last day. Clean phone very minor scratches on the side. Just about brand new. Would recommend this to all ppl looking for a nice upgrade. As you can tell they are a business by the name so it feel safer shopping with the rather a single person. Shipped all the way from Cali to South Carolina fast. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Roddrik

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: It had a lock on it from Vanderbilt medical center so it could not be used at all. According to Apple and Verizon and after days of time trying-i was told by the experts that The certificate could not be removed.
customer_reviews.author: a more

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal, outstanding service
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great, the price was good, and it arrived sooner than expected. I'm thoroughly satisfied. The only downside is that whoever owned the phone before would always start to charge it when it hit 20%. Over time, this will cause the battery cells from 20% to 1% to die off and shorten the battery life. So, whenever the battery hits 20% it's just a matter of minutes (sometimes seconds) before it dies. But, if that's the worst thing out of a used phone, I consider myself lucky.
customer_reviews.author: tiller4Riller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Never had a problem with this phone! Battery life was average and I only got rid of it to upgrade to the 6!
customer_reviews.author: Cadie Coderre

customer_reviews.title: I liked it and it was a decent deal
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished iphones will have their glitches. It was never the same as a real iphone. I liked it and it was a decent deal. But there's always something that's a little off with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Nt happy since product was supposably tested and in good working ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not stay on. Kept switching to black screen showing battery needing charge even though fully charged. Nt happy since product was supposably tested and in good working order.
customer_reviews.author: Rojos5

customer_reviews.title: I like it 👍
customer_reviews.text: Got it today. Was instantly recognized by Apple, and connected to Verizon. I had a regular "contract" SIM CARD from my broken Samsung phone. Everything is very fast. So far, I am very pleased. 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay Shelepugin

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PHONE - GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: so far the phone seems to operate a promised. I had very difficult time synching with my bluetooth earpiece. I wen to T-mobile and they had the same issue. Just as I was about to give up it started working. That was a huge relief.
customer_reviews.author: MBS-California

customer_reviews.title: Description not accurate!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return it because I wanted the 5s instead, but my roommate offered to buy it off of me and when he turned it on, there's a huge pinkish-purpleish oval in the screen that's distracting.. This was not in description when it was purchased. Description said it had 8/10 cosmetic rating, nothing about the screen was in the description. The scratches are fine, but the screen "stain" is not, if I wasn't selling this to my roommate, I would definitely send it back wanting a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working! My son purchased this January 4. The phone shut off March 21. I took it to the Apple Store, and they said it is the logic board, which means it's time to replace the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However the cameras (rear & forward facing) are fantastic and my favorite feature by far
customer_reviews.text: I have had two Android phones before and this is my first iPhone, it isn't as user friendly and intuative to use as the Androids. However the cameras (rear & forward facing) are fantastic and my favorite feature by far.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible
customer_reviews.text: Was not compatible with sprint as they said It would. Don,t believe what you read Should of known with 3 star rating this phone would not be good.
customer_reviews.author: mike DeAngelo

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life, only lasted 10 months
customer_reviews.text: After a month the battery wouldn't hold a charge for longer than a couple of hours so I got a power bank for it. 10 months later it doesn't work at all. Never dropped it, never got wet, or any of the other normal stuff that kills a phone. While it did work it was a good phone and worked like an iPhone should, as long as I had the power bank handy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Phone didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The phone didn't work. It turned on and we were about to connect it to our carrier, but you couldn't hear anything when trying to make a call. Waste of money, since phones are intended for making phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: refurbished iphone5 lasted 3 months until the screen came off and phone started to come apart. charging cable that was sent with the phone came apart within the first few days of use as well. it's a used phone, but still expected more than three months out of it.

customer_reviews.title: Works like new
customer_reviews.text: I figured iPhones were out of my price range, but this was a great bargain and works like new!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The iPhone I purchased for my son is awful. My son had an iPhone 5 that he loved but on the way home from school one day his phone was stolen and he lender up with a broken nose. I wanted to send back the phone we purchased on Amazon as soon as we got it. He was just so excited to have another phone. It never charged properly, now it doesn't change at all. The speakers don't work and the voice is unclear when someone called.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Great price fast delivery. Phone was in like new condition. No scratches at all. Came with the original packaging as well. If you are in the market for an iPhone 5 I highly recommend great quality great price.
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: I hate this product and it was a total waist of ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate this product and it was a total waist of money. I bought it off amazon because I didn't have an upgrade coming up with my Verizon plan but I needed a new phone for college in the fall. There has been something wrong with the charging port since I first received the phone. The phone would only charge with certain chargers and now it wont charge at all. Now I'm stuck with no phone, no upcoming upgrade, and no hope of getting a new phone offline because I'm afraid of this happening again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Arrived in better condition than expected! So scratches what so ever even though was posted as in very good condition with minor scratches. Ordered an 16 GB iPhone 5 for Verizon and got a 32 GB, activated phone same day with no problems at all!
customer_reviews.author: Eaton Andrew Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone- updating from an old droid to an iPhone was a breeze!

customer_reviews.text: Got for granddaughter she loves it Verizon put it on line no problem at all

customer_reviews.title: I received my iPhone and it did not work I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my iPhone and it did not work I had to take it in and the battery had swelled up cause the screen to not clip in and the phone would not turn on after they replaced the battery it worked so I was unhappy as I had to pay $68 on top of buying the phone to get it to work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: all's well that ends well
customer_reviews.text: When I got it there was dust and skin particles in the charging port and it wouldn't charge AT ALL I had to use a needle to remove all of the crap in there, the charger that came with it broke like a week later and there was a light purple splotch in the middle of the screen, now a few months later the spot is gone (it faded away or something) and I mean it works perfectly fine now so...
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: Charging
customer_reviews.text: I've had the phone for about a month now and all I've had is problems with it. When I first got it it didn't hold a charge very long now it powers off randomly and it can be at 70% but come back on and be at 7%. Now I have trouble even getting it to charge. Maybe it was the charger that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT Verizon Compatible
customer_reviews.text: This phone is NOT Verizon compatible. It was in good condition but Verizon would not activate it.

customer_reviews.title: ... turn on when it is charging im not very happy with it and i would like my money back ...
customer_reviews.text: i got the phone 2 months ago i ordered it in july the battery does not hold a charge for very long it dies at 80 % and takes hours to turn on when it is charging im not very happy with it and i would like my money back or a new phone

customer_reviews.title: wrong carrier - problem resolved
customer_reviews.text: The phone I received was not a Verizon phone. UPDATE: I went to return the phone, this process was no problem, the only time it took out of my day was to drop off the phone at the Fed-Ex place. Which isn't a big deal. Once I informed Greengrape/Amazon of my issue I was responded to promptly, the overnighted me a replacement phone which worked properly. This company did a good job in correcting it's mistake. The first phone has a slight scratch on the screen, but was barely noticeable, the second phone is like new.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: so far no problems and works great. She loves it

The only complaint I have is that the battery dies super quick, even without games and videos. I probably get about a couple hours of usage. But then again I did order a used-like new. Other than that I would recommend this phone.

The battery that came with it was not holding a charge so took it to the iPhone store and they replaced it for free cause there was a recall or something on those batteries. Overall satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Broken camera and battery no warranty
customer_reviews.text: This phone came with a malfunctioning battery that was $80 to replace because the phone was purchased over 3 years ago. The seller clearly knew about the issue and decided to pawn off the problem to an innocent buyer. The camera also failed the diagnostics test--another problem that was not made apparent until after purchase. It is ridiculous to not be notified of this upon purchase. I looked through several other phones and decided this one was the best choice because i was not made aware by the seller that the phone was not able to function. I am extremely frustrated with the results and hope that no one else has to experience this ridiculousness.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Sharff

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone 5 16GB Verizon Wireless CDMA 4G LTE Cell Phone - Black
product_meta.description: Network Technology GSM / CDMA / HSPA / EVDO / LTE Launch Announced 2012, September Status Available. Released 2012, September Body Dimensions 123.8 x 58.6 x 7.6 mm (4.87 x 2.31 x 0.30 in) Weight 112 g (3.95 oz) SIM Nano-SIM Display Type LED-backlit IPS LCD, capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors Size 4.0 inches (~60.8% screen-to-body ratio) Resolution 640 x 1136 pixels (~326 ppi pixel density) Multitouch Yes Protection Corning Gorilla Glass, oleophobic coating Platform OS iOS 6, upgradable to iOS 10.3.3, Chipset Apple A6 CPU Dual-core 1.3 GHz Swift (ARM v7-based) GPU PowerVR SGX 543MP3 (triple-core graphics) Memory Card slot No Internal 16/32/64 GB, 1 GB RAM DDR2 Camera Primary 8 MP, 3264 x 2448 pixels, autofocus, LED flash, check quality Features 1/3.2' sensor size, 1.4 µm pixel size, touch focus, geo-tagging, face detection, panorama, HDR (photo) Video 1080p@30fps, check quality Secondary 1.2 MP, 720p@30fps, face detection, FaceTime over Wi-Fi or Cellular Sound Alert types Vibration, proprietary ringtones Loudspeaker Yes 3.5mm jack Yes Comms WLAN Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n, dual-band, hotspot Bluetooth v4.0, A2DP, LE GPS Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS Radio No USB v2.0, reversible connector Features Sensors Accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass Messaging iMessage, SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email Browser HTML5 (Safari) Java No - Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic - AirDrop file sharing - Siri natural language commands and dictation - iCloud cloud service - TV-out - Maps - Audio/video player/editor - Organizer - Document viewer/editor - Photo viewer/editor - Voice memo/dial/command - Predictive text input Battery Non-removable Li-Po 1440 mAh battery (5.45 Wh) Stand-by Up to 225 h (2G) / Up to 225 h (3G) Talk time Up to 8 h (2G) / Up to 8 h (3G)
feature_bullets: The Apple iPhone 5 features a larger 4-inch retina display, adds 4G LTE high-speed data, and includes a faster A6 processor.
Global roaming, Siri voice assistant, an 8-megapixel camera with HD recording, and a HD front facing camera.
This model comes with 16 GB of internal storage and supports WiFi connectivity.
The iPhone 5 offers a slim and stylish design that is both lightweight and easy to carry.
This device has been extensively tested and is ready for activation.
